title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 10
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Shioriko-chan.... can we do the interview for the Shuffle Festival.... right now? I’m sorry that... it has to be right before the live.... Rina-chan’s board「Feeling Down」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It’s not a problem, please lift up your face, Rina-san. Right before the live is when my mood is at its peak. I feel like I can give better answers for the interview if we do it right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Today is the day.... where we get to sing each other’s songs. How do you feel?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Frankly speaking, I’m really looking forward to it. I joined the club a little late, so I didn’t know the story behind how everyone’s first songs came to be. But I’m happy that I was able to learn various things and think about them in my own way. I’m also happy that I was given a chance to sing the songs.... That’s why it’s inevitable that I would not only be enthusiastic about the upcoming live, but also excited to try a new and exciting venture.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You seem.... really with it today, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Is that so? I’m glad if that’s the case. But I’m also relying heavily on you and the rest of Nijigaku members, Rina-san. Let’s enjoy today’s Shuffle Festival!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah! I feel like.... I can’t stay still anymore. Rina-chan’s board「Eager」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m sure everyone has already gathered. Let’s head to the venue.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>When everyone is there.... let’s form a circle, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
